message: It's so lonely playing BF alone :(. Would anyone like to setup a weekly time to meet on Ventrilo and play? Btw, become a member so you can use the Ventrilo and play random games with people!

Yesyesyes. Pretty much any evening would work, except I'll be gone next week wed. - monday. Not a member yet due to money (trip next weekend being the main reason :x ), so dunno about vent at the moment.
It's just frustrating playing with only randoms...always camping or acting like idiots.
btw, i'll get ur switch back to u soon. sorry for bein such a slacker!
Travis, he even bought a new headset just so he can hear footsteps!
@executor I think by "play games with people" you mean come play battlefield with me...

So frustrating xD  I usually end up playing medic with randoms since LMGs are ridiculous at range and I can revive people.  The switch, eh, whenever xP  I'll be on campus tomorrow afternoon/evening studying if you'll be around, otherwise we can find some other time that would work.
I feel like this topic was made just to lure me in...still can't play it on PC BRO.  Soon, soon.

@JunklessTrunk You really should get a PC soooooon! Especially now that you're getting paid mad money. How about instead of baking me a cake to thank me, you can buy yourself a PC so that I don't have to see @executor pawing for playmates? Sounds like a win-win for everyone
I will get on Vent as soon as I can afford the Teh Pwn Membership.  I need to pay rent and save up for columbus, but after that then I can afford membership
awesome :), hopefully we can start doing some pwnage soon :)

I just realized noone posted IDs in this thread xD

In-game: FasterZ  (add me add me add me)
Steam/vent: c[_]`Cooking is Bravo!
I think we'll have a directory for all of this stuff soon :p haha
i just added u sir! play bfbc2 with me :)
Be sure to get a membership so you can join us and get all the other awesome perks from being a member.
By the way everyone, we will be playing BFBC2 on Thursday nights on the Ventrilo server!
Much fun was had this past Thursday.  Best squad pin pretty much every game.  If there are any more players lurking in the shadows come join us next week!  We don't bite 8D
